document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of decapods (Crustacea) from the coast of the São Paulo state (Brazil) supported by integrative molecular and morphological data: I. Infraorder Caridea: families Hippolytidae, Lysmatidae, Ogyrididae, Processidae and Thoridae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of decapods (Crustacea) from the coast of the São Paulo state (Brazil) supported by integrative molecular and morphological data: I. Infraorder Caridea: families Hippolytidae, Lysmatidae, Ogyrididae, Processidae and Thoridae

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Western Atlantic—USA (North Carolina) to Brazil ( Amapá to Rio Grande do Sul ), Uruguay ( Christoffersen 1979 ; 1998 ).
